message: Welcome to Pollo Vision ! It appears that the time has come for you to start your recycling adventure! Start by sending a picture of your trash to help with your sorting !
Fun fact ! Recycling a can of aluminum can save enough energy to power a television for hours !
Removing trash from the ocean helps fishermen a lot! Which gives me more food ðŸ˜‹
